text:
#Hydroxychloroquine synthesized in 1946 and proposed as safer alternative to #chloroquine in 1955

Both inhibit CD4 T cell stimulation but promote CD8 T cell stimulation 

Similar pharmacology

lysosomotropic by virtue of protonation & trapping inside acidic lysosomes

 #COVID19 https://t.co/in3rTp1w9k
